form.script: var ctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link;function initctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link(attempt){try{ctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link=new Flyout2('ctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link','microsoft_link','','ctl00_microsoft_flyout_content','BOTTOM_CENTER','LEFT','NONE','NONE',200,200,200,10,0,0,100,5000,true,true,false,'#DDDDDD',25);if (ctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link.removeOCB!=null){ctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link.registerOpenEffect(new FlyingEffect('MIDDLE_CENTER'));ctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link.registerCloseEffect(new FlyingEffect('MIDDLE_CENTER'));}}catch(e){alert("Failed to initialize [microsoft_flyout] \n.Error:"+ e+ "\nPlease contact support@obout.com for support.");}}initctl00_microsoft_flyoutmicrosoft_link(1);
